description: This file defines a UI component named 'Loader' using LightningJS framework. It includes a template with animated circles, a property 'loaderColor', state management for fade transition 'alpha', and a method to start an interval-based animation.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component for a loading indicator with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval to toggle the 'alpha' state between 0 and 1 for fade animation.
